channel.title: Client Problem
channel.description: hello i need help currently trying to run my client :/ when i click run it pops up The system cannot find the specified path. When i edit run.bat it has... @echo off cd files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.30\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

item.title: Client Problem
item.dc:creator: @Excist Excist
item.description:
@Excist wrote:

hello i need help currently trying to run my client when i click run it pops up The system cannot find the specified path.
When i edit run.bat
it has…
@echo off
cd files
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.30\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause
